params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.network
params.description: The network name to attach the VM's network interface to. The value will be prefixed with global/networks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified network resource URL. If unspecified, the global default network is used.

params.name: data.use_private_address
params.description: If set to true, do not attach a public IP address to the VM. Note that without a public IP address, additional configuration is required to allow the VM to access Google services. See https://cloud.google.com/vpc/docs/configure-private-google-access for more information.

params.name: data.subnetwork
params.description: If the specified network is configured for custom subnet creation, the name of the subnetwork to attach the instance to must be specified here. The value is prefixed with regions/*/subnetworks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified subnetwork resource URL. If the * character appears in the value, it is replaced with the region that the virtual machine has been allocated in.

methods.name: getNetwork
methods.description:
The network name to attach the VM's network interface to. The value will be prefixed with global/networks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified network resource URL.

If unspecified, the global default network is used.

Generated from protobuf field string network = 1;

methods.description:
The network name to attach the VM's network interface to. The value will be prefixed with global/networks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified network resource URL.

If unspecified, the global default network is used.

params.name: var
params.description:
The network name to attach the VM's network interface to. The value will be prefixed with global/networks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified network resource URL.

If unspecified, the global default network is used.

methods.name: getUsePrivateAddress
methods.description:
If set to true, do not attach a public IP address to the VM. Note that without a public IP address, additional configuration is required to allow the VM to access Google services.

See https://cloud.google.com/vpc/docs/configure-private-google-access for more information.

Generated from protobuf field bool use_private_address = 2;

methods.name: setUsePrivateAddress
methods.description:

See https://cloud.google.com/vpc/docs/configure-private-google-access for more information.

Generated from protobuf field bool use_private_address = 2;

params.name: var
params.description:
If set to true, do not attach a public IP address to the VM. Note that without a public IP address, additional configuration is required to allow the VM to access Google services.

See https://cloud.google.com/vpc/docs/configure-private-google-access for more information.

methods.name: getSubnetwork
methods.description:
If the specified network is configured for custom subnet creation, the name of the subnetwork to attach the instance to must be specified here.

The value is prefixed with regions/*/subnetworks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified subnetwork resource URL. If the * character appears in the value, it is replaced with the region that the virtual machine has been allocated in.

Generated from protobuf field string subnetwork = 3;

The value is prefixed with regions/*/subnetworks/ unless it contains a /, in which case it is assumed to be a fully specified subnetwork resource URL. If the * character appears in the value, it is replaced with the region that the virtual machine has been allocated in.

Generated from protobuf field string subnetwork = 3;
